website_summaries.verdict: Choose these reusable drinking straws if your top concern is sustainability, as they are made of natural bamboo.
pros: Handmade of bamboo, a material that is strong, natural, and biodegradable
Set includes 10 straws that are 8 inches in length, a storage bag, and cleaning brush made of natural coconut fibers
Sets containing various sizes are also available
Attractive neutral color appeals to many consumers
cons: Straws have a strange taste at first, but it fades with use
Won't fit all beverage tops with pre-cut holes

customer_reviews.title: The best investment ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those people who are trying to eliminate their plastic usage and stopping using plastic straws while out and at home. The case is small enough to where I can bring all of the straws and not have to worry about it being too bulky in my bag. I love these and they are super easy to clean. Anyone who is looking for a reusable straw I think this it a great set to get
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the other low star reviews
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning brush is useless, only fits on 1 straw since the straws are different sizes, i expected at least a semi durable brush but it clean the one straw 1 time and its basically junk now.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Eco smart but not tasteless
customer_reviews.text: Eco friendly but they make my water taste like wood if it sits in my water for too long
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product came with ZERO plastic packaging! Wonderful straws and I absolutely love that the cleaner is coconut instead of plastic! I love these! Defiantly softer than metal so you won’t chip your teeth either!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: I love the straws
customer_reviews.text: I love the straws. They had a bit of a funny taste at first but after a couple of washings I don't notice it any more. The cleaning brush is awful though; doesn't fit in the thinnest straws and falling apart and into the trash after two uses.
customer_reviews.author: k. l. roberts

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: not small enough for my tumbler lids. Good for drinks without lids
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Simple solution to the overuse of plastic straws!
customer_reviews.text: Excited to find this earth-friendly alternative to plastic straws. Especially pleased that a cleaning brush is included, as well as a little drawstring bag to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Matthews Clark

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are as natural as you can get. My daughter likes them thus far (it's only been a few days though). My only complaint is that I wish there were washing instructions included (I looked up online) and also, one of my straws came broken (squashed and cracked).
customer_reviews.author: Malea518

customer_reviews.title: It gets dirty.
customer_reviews.text: Well.. I kinda liked it somehow but not getting this again. It’s hard to clean, to really clean it you have to dip it in hot soap water and then hope the soap smell and flavor wash off after severe washing. I like the thing that came with it to clean inside but the rests of drink just stuck in it. I got these because the metal ones get cold and hot depending on what I’m drinking but this one is not the most sanitary option.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very brittle
customer_reviews.text: The coconut brush the offer is very rough which can scrape the inside of the straw causing it to chip in the future which results in less durability. Another thing when you wash this you have to use strong soap because I used a high quality soap and it smelled awful from whatever we drank that day, the strong soap covers the smell but why keep adding more chemicals if you bought this straw ? It will diminish its durability even more. Lastly They’re too thick which only makes it useful for boba but you can’t enjoy coconut water or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Micheletti

customer_reviews.title: Received with broken straw & used brush?!?
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo straws were just delivered, no damage to the packaging. The straws came in a nice little bag but when I opened it to check out the straws, one was damaged, so already wondering how long these will last. Really disappointed this wasn't checked before being shipped. Also the little cleaning brush that came with it looks used as it's missing half its bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Quality straws
customer_reviews.text: The straws are excellent with a nice variety of diameters to allow use for milkshake or smoothie type drinks. I did not like the brush with fibers not securely fastened and falling off the brush, and they end up who knows where. I hope they are edible. Seriously, I’m now on the lookout for a suitable replacement brush but still feel this was a good purchase and will likely buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice straws, but not good for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these and I do think they would work perfectly for adults and older children, but they do not hold up well at all with younger ones. I have a 3 year old that loves using straws and I refused to buy the single use plastic ones so I purchased these. They are nice straws, but they don’t hold up well at all to a 3 year old that has a tendency to occasionally bite down on a straw. He pretty easily snapped a couple of them by gnawing at them a bit. Next time I will opt for a sturdier metal straw.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it’s new
customer_reviews.text: Looked very dirty spider webs inside. Looked like they were used or kept in bad condition. Not happy about this order and the cleaning straw came destroyed
customer_reviews.author: maria ines walteros

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea
customer_reviews.text: My dentist suggested that I drink my coffee/tea through a straw to keep my teeth whiter. I didn't want to contribute to the plastic problem, so I decided to give these bamboo straws a try. They arrived yesterday--perfect condition, right on time--and I'm excited to incorporate them into my "scene!"
customer_reviews.author: AnneEM

customer_reviews.title: The bamboo is so much better than the metal options!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much more than the metal options. Don't clink on my teeth or have a weird taste the way the metal do and are cute looking and easy to clean (comes with a little brush... the brush is just ok, I have another one I typically use that has better bristles than the brush that comes with the straws). The pack I received had different diameters for the straws which I actually really like as the wider ones are great for smoothies and thicker drinks while the skinnier ones are great for water, iced tea, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to accidentally throw away
customer_reviews.text: As an environmental major I love these. More sustainable than regular straws. Can really make a difference by not using plastic straws everyday. But it could only be me, be weary I’ve already accidentally threw one away with my drink. You have to get used to it. But all in all the idea and invention is spectacular for the environment and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam n

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted them, I was unsure about them. Now that we've used them, I really like 'em a lot! They seem to give your morning smoothie a festive vibe....only thing missing when we use them is the umbrella and coconut rum.🧉🍹
customer_reviews.author: N. O.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I thought of these sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I felt so bad using plastic straws knowing what they did to the environment and didn't realize they couldn't really be recycled. So I found these and they are perfect! they come in a sweet package to hold them in so they don't get scattered in the drawer and they're taste free with different size openings. I love them! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: IO

customer_reviews.title: Really great eco-friendly straws
customer_reviews.text: These really look good quality, I like that they come with a brush for cleaning and the package bag is very nice touch. Since they're natural they come in different sizes. The other thing is that they feel big compared to the normal straw but making the effort for a clean environment is important.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo straws
customer_reviews.text: These straws are solid, strong, and very smooth. They came in a variety of diameters, which is great for facilitating selection of the perfect straw for the drink. I am very pleased with these straws, and shall not be using plastic straws in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Bowegeddes

customer_reviews.title: Brush handles? Could be.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and when they arrived I realized they would also be perfect for handmade artist brushes. So I am going to divert a couple for brush handles! Can't wait to do it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped on time and nothing was broken. Quickly washed all of the straws in very hot water and scrubbed inside with coconut fiber brush. Popped one in a fresh smoothie and it worked great, no funky wooden taste and thick smoothie pulled through fine. Great product so far
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, feels good on the lips
customer_reviews.text: My bamboo straws just arrived! Given that Mother Nature made them, there are slight variations in sizes. I've been using stainless steel straws for a while and while I like those as well, I like how the bamboo feels on my lips and teeth. Even though paper straws have gotten more sophisticated, they are still paper which I worry use too many resources and I hate how paper feels on my lips. So, I think bamboo is the way to go now; highly renewable, lightweight, feels good on lips and teeth and reusable.
customer_reviews.author: jenmcgaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great Straws to use & for the Environment! :D
customer_reviews.text: These are great but they can crack in the dishwasher under high heat. They are even more eco-friendly then the metal straws and probably lighter. I would recommend them as an alternative to plastic that have chemicals and end up in the ocean or landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian2020

customer_reviews.title: The best and so pro-environment
customer_reviews.text: I like the straws' sustainability. There are many sizes to choose from depending on individual needs/desires and maybe viscosity of the drink. If I had to find a "con" it would be that I would love to have a taller bamboo straw that could work with my travel container. However, this does not diminish my enjoyment over these clever bamboo straws. They are beautiful and I feel good making a contribution toward cleaning up the planet.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, however the cleaning brush is too thin.
customer_reviews.text: Love these reusable brushes! The cleaning brush is too thin so I had to purchase a bigger one that would be effective in cleaning the walls of the straws.
customer_reviews.author: SaraB

customer_reviews.title: Nicely package for gift giving
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift, so I have not used. Packaged nicely in a cloth drawstring bag for gift giving. The bamboo straws were smooth inside and out and felt good in hand. Would purchase this product again from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to plastic straws
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition! I don’t use straws as much but having little ones who do use them often, I have found this to be a simple alternative for plastic straws. Easy to clean too and durable (the kids have tried to break them) Do not regret buying.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly plastic or paper straw alternative!
customer_reviews.text: I use these everywhere I go! It’s a great conversation starter and I feel great about reducing my carbon footprint by not using plastic or paper straws!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to metal or plastic straws
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean, sturdy and no taste. Only downside is they are different size holes and can stain with certain drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen coley

customer_reviews.title: Please get these!
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to keep handy. Easy to clean. I take one in my purse at all times. It warms my heart to take one out and use it. I also gifted some and my friend was ecstatic. At restaurants they appreciate less waste. Yes. One straw makes an impact. I just rinse and let dry and re use.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rodriguez Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Mold Smell
customer_reviews.text: These things smell really strongly like mold or old bathwater. No way I'll be using them. Waste of $9.
customer_reviews.author: Oceabys

customer_reviews.title: Cute, useful, but has a woody taste
customer_reviews.text: Awesome alternative to disposable single use plastic straws, but I find the taste of the bamboo tends to linger and change the taste of the beverage. Compared to a metal straw, I prefer the metal. These straws are still super cute, and the convenient carrying bag they come with makes it easy to travel with. The bamboo cleaner is also great!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Saetae

customer_reviews.title: Good straws!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these straws! Coming from someone who is trying to be more aware of their impact, I was looking for some good straws that would be good to use a lot. The variety of sizes comes in handy more than I thought! The wider ones work great with smoothies while the small ones are great with other less thick drinks. Over all, I love them and the amount of it comes with. I have a straw to each member of my family and still had some to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic
customer_reviews.text: Trying these because of I am trying to rid myself of plastic straws. Bit odd at first but I will get the hang of it. Comes with a little brush to clean the inside with.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffri-Scott Michaels

customer_reviews.title: amazing straws!!
customer_reviews.text: love the reusable bag they come in and straws are amazing! nice and sturdy, durable and love how straws come in different sizes! got complimented on them too!
customer_reviews.author: kay - dence ✨

customer_reviews.title: Love my bamboo straws.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bamboo straws. They’re easy to clean and very reasonably priced. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Miller Wood

customer_reviews.title: Way better than plastic!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has to drink green juice and was using plastic which really bothered me as she is drinking the juice due to health issues so it only made sense to go with healthy straws. Was happy to see that even though they are all the same length they vary in diameter size. My daughter enjoys washing them with the cute little brush that came with the straws.
customer_reviews.author: maryellen mast

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on the day promised and matched the description perfectly. I purchased as a Christmas gift, so haven't used yet. They appear to be sturdy and with the included brush should be easy to clean. I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Linde Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea. Just understand if you drink anything out of it will taste like wood. But not only that, say you stop using the straw and you drink out of your cup, well now the entire contents of your cup soaked up the taste of wood. There are no refunds.
customer_reviews.author: Estela Nuñez

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo
customer_reviews.text: These are so amazing! For all the people who complain about splinters and things, these are LEGIT bamboo! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: God I looooove my bamboo straws easy to clean and they don’t have a wear taste from drinking your beverages. I love them. I’ve had mine for over two months and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Brush is useless
customer_reviews.text: The straws are Ok, my problem is with the cleaning brush. It does not fit through all the straws and the ones it fits through is too loose so it can not clean any of my straws. Hope this problem gets fixed otherwise there is no point in including a brush that dorsn’t serve it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go Green!!
customer_reviews.text: Straws look great. Had some splitting near where you put your mouth besides that the straws are great and durable. I am happy to be doing my part to prevent more plastic from hitting our beloved oceans.
customer_reviews.author: Shannel

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo straws
customer_reviews.text: These are a requested Christmas gift for my 13 year old granddaughter, and I’m sure she’ll be very happy to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Hole Size
customer_reviews.text: Dislike how each hole is a different size. I understand why, but didn’t realize prior to receiving them. I prefer the smaller hole straws for water and use the larger ones for shakes and smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: FSU320320

customer_reviews.title: Not paper and not metal!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Leopard 48 catamaran in charter down in the BVI and paper straws just do not work and metal is not the answer in that climate. These straws are the answer!! Love them and our guest are happier. #mojocharters mojocharters.com
customer_reviews.author: Dan Draper

customer_reviews.title: Save the turtles
customer_reviews.text: Very good product but they do stain fairly easily. They’re wood so it’s expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney-Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: amazing bamboo!
customer_reviews.text: no chemical remnants nor glaze. Work well in hot or cold drinks. Great for lemon and lime juice :)
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Reusable and nice cleaning brush to clean inside of straw . I love them. No more plastic for me. Bamboo is a organic renewable plant
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic
customer_reviews.text: I give them as gifts to friends! They love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda W. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & smooth bamboo straws
customer_reviews.text: These reusable bamboo straws are great!! I’ve left them in a drink in the fridge overnight and it didn’t hurt them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jack & Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet but they look very sturdy. I like the carrying bag that comes with them
customer_reviews.author: Diana S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight, and easy to clean. Pleasantly surprised that it came with so many and a nice little reusable cloth sack to keep them in. I also like that they vary slightly in size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The straws were very pretty and convenient because there are different sizes
customer_reviews.text: The straws were very pretty and convenient because there are different sizes. The cleaning utensil works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Tran Ngoc Quynh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Straw, Bad Cleaning Brush
customer_reviews.text: Amazing straws! Only problem is the cleaning brush...It’s too big for the smaller straws and it breaks off and gets smaller the more you clean it. If they sell with a new straw it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Zech Slade

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic straws
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product, which helped me to substitute plastic straws. There are also very comfortable and easy to clean. The product is top quility, so you can reuse those straws several times.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: They smell like wood, makes beverages taste like wood
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect size and I love the color and I love that they are bamboo. However, they smell so strongly of wood as they should, butt it affects what I'm drinking. I soaked mine in a bath of vermouth in hopes that it would change things. Happy to report the vermouth did the trick. Sadly, threw it out, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all. Will crack after two use.
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to give it a good review but these bamboo are so brittle. The straw crack after two washing ... And being in water. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nhan T. Lu

customer_reviews.title: No plastic straws buy reusable
customer_reviews.text: These are thicker than I thought but they work well so far!
customer_reviews.author: OG

customer_reviews.title: Great straws!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are many sizes, and it came with a brush!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Some can crack but other than that its really good
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I use them every day
customer_reviews.text: I bought them around 30 days ago. I don't put them in the dishwasher. Great for vegetable juices and fruit smoothies. I wish the brush for the straws was slightly longer and a bit sturdier, but functions perfectly well with the wider straws in the bunch. Good value. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and are great quality! I do get a little bit of a wood taste when I drink water with them!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Cannon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Would buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my art project. The package arrived on time, inside they also sent the cleanning tool for the straw too. So far so good. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Binh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Say no to plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding buy! Durable and certainly come at a good value! I love the bag they came in and the brush that was included! So glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Faye

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Only one question, is it supposed to bubble when it is used in a soda drink?
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Too big and wide
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not comfortable to drink from-too wide and thick. Huuuge!
customer_reviews.author: Zak Romanoff

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: We use them everyday. Can’t wait for summer cocktail time!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Canio

customer_reviews.title: ... little bit thick but they actually are light and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: The straws look a little bit thick but they actually are light and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great straws
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 3 different sets of organic bamboo straws, this is the best one! The brush isn’t great but the straws are wonderful. While some of the straws are too fat to fit in my cups there are a good number that do fit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety in the sizes! There are also plenty to store inside your home and keep a few in the car fornon the go! They the perfect little pouch to also throw a few in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love My new straws and am so happy to be ridding myself of all use of plastic. They are sturdy and easy to clean. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these straws
customer_reviews.text: I have tried, the stainless, glass and silicone straws and the bamboo are by far my favorite.. I like that they are biodegradable and not as harsh on your teeth as the glass and stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Biodegradable working straws
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cool. They are re useable but also biodegradable. Interested to see how many uses we get out of them
customer_reviews.author: jjohn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the planet
customer_reviews.text: These are great so far. Perfect for my thicker smoothies. I use cocoa bits and they were always getting stuck in the thinner plastic straws. I love that they are natural, organic and reusable. The cleaner brush is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Make the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Clean easily and are not hard like metal ones. Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: The product is of very good quality. I would like to be able to purchase in larger (bulk) quantities,
customer_reviews.author: GladstoneR

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it's just like it's described.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it arrived safely and quickly. Great seller, thanks a bunch!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Styles

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Comes neatly packaged, sent quickly, various sizes which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Love the different sizes. cleans easily. Do not get damaged easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get these if you don’t want any more straws in the ocean
customer_reviews.text: Great straws, great bag for them! Mine came without the cleaning rod so I decided to make one.
customer_reviews.author: Lucio Assis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to use the straws because they are a gift. But they look and feel great looking forward to using them. Exactly what I was picturing when I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The bag and the cleaning brush make this product so convenient. Thanks for giving us a great way to eliminate plastic straws!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: MIA brush
customer_reviews.text: The straws are nice but they didn’t put the brush in the order so now I don’t have a way to clean them properly.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Langston

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my son for Christmas. Order arrived promptly. They were of very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative to plastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought four sets of these for myself and some friends to try with the new straw bans, everyone loves them - my friends and their kids, so thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Flynn

customer_reviews.title: very resistant ! they look very durable as well
customer_reviews.text: Good product! just a little too big for my coffee cup
customer_reviews.author: katia Leyva

customer_reviews.title: I Like How I Can Re Use Them And They Are ...
customer_reviews.text: I Like How I Can Re Use Them And They Are Really Easy To Clean I Had No Trouble Cleaning Them With Out The Little Brush. Will Buy Again, They Are Way Better Than The Plastic Straws
customer_reviews.author: Thalia

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable straws
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted some bamboo straws to add to my collection of reusables. These are pretty perfect, aren't chipping at all and are easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Dandy Weeden

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to plastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this great alternative to plastic straws!! It even comes with a cleaning brush. I have been giving them to all my friends to use!
customer_reviews.author: COLLETTE JIMENEZ

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I really love that some of the straws have a wider opening that makes them perfect for smoothies - thanks for making it so easy to be plastic free :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Personal Way to Make A Difference
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a great way to take personal steps for being part of a change in the environment. Everyone should enjoy this simple step. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: O. Dandashi

customer_reviews.title: Love these straws!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bamboo straws work great! There is no taste to them and they clean well. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU FOR THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING product! I will be ordering these in bulk for my company to give out as thank you gifts to all our clients- phenomenal product!!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron C.

customer_reviews.title: Save the turtles!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of straws for the whole family. Comes with a bag and cleaning brush.
customer_reviews.author: AGirl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to plastic and metal. Multiple sizes. Easy to clean and muslin carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dor

customer_reviews.title: Order incomplete. Seller unresponsive.
customer_reviews.text: The straws were useful and a good size but I could use each only once because the cleaning brush promised in the sellers description was not included in my order. I contacted the seller twice within 1 week of receiving the order (about 3 weeks ago) to request a brush but have not received a brush or any response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jean G

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo straws are GREAT!!!!!! no plastic waste; no chance of plastic straws getting into oceans and injuring sea life!!!

product_meta.title: NATURAL NEO Organic Bamboo Straws Reusable with Coconut Fiber Brush 20cm 8" Drinking Straw Biodegradable Kids Adults | Set 10 Assorted Sizes with Bag | Natural Alternative to Plastic
feature_bullets: ✔️ THE BEST CHOICE OF DRINKING STRAWS FOR KIDS & ADULTS - This beautiful set of 10 organic bamboo straws originate are reusable, biodegradable and natural. NATURALNEO bamboo straws are extremely strong and durable by nature and NOT contain inks or dyes. Not only do they look great, but they are practical too. These are the great alternative to plastic straws as well as the other straws.

✔️ PROTECTING YOUR HEALTH AND YOUR FAMILY FROM TOXIC AND CHEMICAL: Why green straws? We refuse to use inks, dyes, and bleach in our bamboo drinking straws – inks, dyes, and bleaches can be harmful to you, your family and friends – your safety and health are our top priority!

✔️ BECOME AN ENVIRONMENTALLY CONSCIOUS PERSON - As parents, DID YOU KNOW in the U.S we use over 500 MILLION plastic drinking straws per day, that is enough plastic waste to wrap the entire circumference of the earth two and a half times! By using these reusable, biodegradable, plant-based drinking straws you are helping the environment by reducing plastic waste. PLEASE TAKE THE FIRST STEP TO PROTECT THE EARTH!

✔️ THE NATURAL NEO MISSION: When you buy NATURAL NEO bamboo straws, you are joining the NATURAL NEO mission to eliminate every single plastic straw waste! Our business rule is “100% Satisfaction or Money Back - No Questions Asked” and let us know! Click 'Add to Cart' and 'Buy now'!

✔️ SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We assure with this card, you will perfectly surprise any recipients with a 100% SATISFACTION. If you are unsatisfied with this item for any reason, please contact us promptly, we will immediately send you a replacement or refund your purchase price. Click 'Add to Cart' and 'Buy now'!
